summary: Consume the Lemlist API to interact with activities, campaigns, leads, teams, and unsubscribes.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with (e.g., activity, campaign, lead, team, unsubscribe).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Choose the operation to perform on the selected resource (e.g., get all activities, get many campaigns).

parameters.name: returnAll
parameters.description: Specify whether to return all results or only up to a given limit.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Set the maximum number of results to return within the specified limit.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Add filters to narrow down the results based on specific criteria (e.g., campaign ID, activity type).
